item.description:
Meet local Entrepreneur/Investor/Restauranteur and President of FDI Youngevity William Andreoli!

Bill Andreoli is A-Ma-Zing! He has been and entrepreneur and investor since he was 18 years old. In the past 22 years, as a restauranteur he's developed the most successful 50's style Breakfast place in NH, Marianne's Diner, done commercial and residential real estate deals and was successful in the stock market. He will tell you what he loves most, next to being a Dad, is being the President of FDI Youngevity. In the other ventures, he was making all the money. With FDIY he makes it possible for everyone to save money, make money, get healthy and create wealth.


Come enjoy refreshments and networking with local business professionals, hear an overview of FDI Youngevity, meet President Bill Andreoli and learn the Power of One.

 

Tue 7PM FDIY Corporate, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

My tax guy says that EVERYONE should own a home based business...here's why - http://wp.me/pNfNP-2A

RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Meet local Entrepreneur/Investor/Restauranteur and President of FDIY Youngevity
